attributes.action: A referendum on any proposed increase in the EU budget
attributes.additional_details:
Any increase in the EU budget, that would increase the contribution made by UK tax payers should be ratified by the electorate in a referendum.

The EU is currently proposing to increase its budget by 5.23% which would cost the UK tax payers an extra £834 Million.

As a UK tax payer I believe the electorate ought to be asked whether this additional expenditure is a priority given the current economic crisis.
